body_html:
Hi Martin,

Thanks for the response.

I typed in

export TF_BINARY_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/linux/cpu/tensorflow-0.9.0rc0-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl
sudo pip install --upgrade $TF_BINARY_URL

Both installation and import of tensorflow in python were successful. I am working on ubuntu 14.04 LTS in a virtual machine.

Thanks for the response.

body:
Hi Martin,

Thanks for the response. 

I typed in 

```
export TF_BINARY_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/linux/cpu/tensorflow-0.9.0rc0-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl
sudo pip install --upgrade $TF_BINARY_URL
```

Both installation and import of tensorflow in python were successful. I am working on ubuntu 14.04 LTS in a virtual machine.
